name: FBA English Resources
body:
## Welcome!
Welcome to the FBA English website. See below for resources on writing, a Works Cited template, and information on upcoming major assignments.

## Summer Reading Assignments
* AP English IV
* English IV
* AP English III
* English III

## Resources
* Works Cited page template
* Information on embedding quotes

## Teacher Emails
* [Mrs. Knezek](mailto:lknezek@firstdallas.org)
* [Mrs. Roeder](mailto:groeder@firstdallas.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
